items.a: A real-time assistant that extracts factual claims from speech/text and validates them against documents and trusted context.
Teams doing interviews, sales calls, negotiations, and high-stakes meetings where accuracy matters.
We extract claims, search your knowledge base, and return a verdict with supporting evidence and confidence signals.
You control what you upload. Early access focuses on privacy-by-default and minimal data retention.
Targeting Q1 2026 for public availability, with rolling early access before that.
Join the waitlist with your email. We'll reach out with onboarding details when your slot opens.
